topic.title: Make ZeroNet Great Again!
topic.body: Transform this place in an heaven for piracy! Please tell me what you want, i will search it for you and i will upload it galactichan or copy the magnet URL on zerotorrent!

1623654807_15brvpgJ5PFKGLF6976wR5gMd2ryz.body:
> [g8wl6n](#comment_5_1QArHQfn2ikmHDuqvBPcDPpomSrJtKqiZB): https://1337x.to/torrent/3530251/Wayne-S01-COMPLETE-720p-WEB-x264-MARXSPAWN-TGx/

why the next time don't copy the magnet directly in zerotorrent? (to contribute to the zite and make zeronet more attractive and useful? :) ) also in my country 1337x is blocked :( 

Anyway...i will add more TV series on zerotorrent! tell me what you want to see? If anyone want to help me coping magnet urls maybe we can grow this network anbd save some torrent in case clearnet sites will go offline :)

> [kapec](#comment_101_1CQ14MAUEp55ijU6rQLQ9vZdzxCQe9s1SF): My wish list:-BBS Documentary-Good copy bad copy-Computer Chronicles-Pure Pwnage web series (preferably the og torrent it was distributed officially)

all added to zerotorrent! :)

> [fethearon](#comment_5_1CQm69MFcNZ4Wbn68mgy5f65JjZ6Ca1LUB): Any chance you have a recent crack of Game Maker Studio for Windows? I'm on Linux but a friend of mine is looking for a Windows version.

added to zerotorrent! :)

Here also the link of galactichan:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/19HKdTAeBh5nRiKn791czY7TwRB1QNrf1Q/

Many links to torrent zites are also included in the zeroseed pack:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1622480057_1PSeiYvqdseW3aoqEV5gddDRr7gCHSJPHB

> [kapec](#comment_106_1CQ14MAUEp55ijU6rQLQ9vZdzxCQe9s1SF): For me the reason is preatty simple:-more content -> more people -> more content ... [...]

Totally agree! Another important point to consider is that zeronet allow the creation of torrent communities that cannot be shut down, and because of this it will be very useful against DMCA takedowns of torrent sites on clearnet. When big torrent communities will arrive here also zeronet will grow! :) (piracy is more tollerated by people than pedos and racist...)
